vendors.name: Cisco IOS
vendors.description: Cisco IOS and IOS-XE running configurations
vendors.example:
hostname Router1
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.0
 no shutdown
!
ip ssh version 2
ip ssh time-out 60
!
line vty 0 4
 transport input ssh
 login local

vendors.name: Cisco NX-OS
vendors.description: Cisco Nexus data center switch configurations
vendors.example:
hostname Nexus9K
!
vlan 100
  name Production
!
interface Ethernet1/1
  switchport mode trunk
  switchport trunk allowed vlan 100-200
  no shutdown

vendors.name: Juniper Junos
vendors.description: Juniper Junos OS configurations in set or hierarchical format

vendors.name: Aruba AOS-CX
vendors.example:
hostname aruba-cx-switch
!
vlan 100
    name Production
!
interface 1/1/1
    no shutdown
    vlan access 100

vendors.name: Aruba AOS-Switch
vendors.example:
hostname "aruba-switch"
module 1 type j9986a
vlan 100
   name "Production"
   tagged 1-24
interface 1
   name "Uplink"

vendors.name: Aruba WLC
vendors.example:
hostname aruba-wlc
!
wlan ssid-profile "Corporate"
   essid "Corp-WiFi"
   type employee
   opmode wpa3-aes

vendors.name: Palo Alto PAN-OS
vendors.example:
set deviceconfig system hostname firewall1
set network interface ethernet ethernet1/1 layer3 ip 192.168.1.1/24
set rulebase security rules Allow-Web from any to any application web-browsing action allow

vendors.name: Arista EOS
vendors.example:
hostname arista-leaf1
!
vlan 100
   name Production
!
interface Ethernet1
   switchport mode trunk
   switchport trunk allowed vlan 100-200
!
management api http-commands
   no shutdown

vendors.name: VyOS
Fortinet FortiGate
vendors.example:
config system global
    set hostname "fortigate"
    set admin-scp enable
end
config system interface
    edit "port1"
        set ip 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.0
        set allowaccess ping https ssh
    next
end

vendors.name: Extreme EXOS
vendors.example:
configure snmp sysName "extreme-switch"
create vlan Production tag 100
configure vlan Production add ports 1-24 tagged
enable ssh2

vendors.name: Extreme VOSS
vendors.example:
system name extreme-voss
vlan create 100 name Production type port-mstprstp 0
vlan members add 100 1/1-1/24 portmember

vendors.name: Huawei VRP
vendors.example:
sysname Huawei-Switch
#
vlan 100
 description Production
#
interface GigabitEthernet0/0/1
 port link-type trunk
 port trunk allow-pass vlan 100 to 200

vendors.name: MikroTik RouterOS
vendors.example:
/system identity set name=mikrotik-router
/ip address add address=192.168.1.1/24 interface=ether1
/ip service set ssh port=22 disabled=no
/ip firewall filter add chain=input action=accept protocol=tcp dst-port=22

vendors.name: Nokia SR OS
vendors.example:
configure system name "nokia-router"
configure router interface "system" address 10.0.0.1/32
configure router bgp autonomous-system 65001

vendors.name: Cumulus Linux
vendors.example:
auto swp1
iface swp1
    bridge-access 100

auto vlan100
iface vlan100
    vlan-id 100
    address 192.168.1.1/24

vendors.name: Common
vendors.description: Vendor-agnostic rules that apply to multiple platforms
vendors.example:
# Generic configuration patterns
# These rules check for common security issues
# across multiple vendor platforms
